name: Tools4Boards Tuning Vise Ski and Snowboard
categories: Ski wax stands, vises and tables
description: Simple and economical, this vise gets the job done. Whether you're on a gauge filling mission or just looking to wax your bases, this simple vise support even the fattest boards.Made of lightweight aluminum and impact-resistant Lexan polycarbonate plasticSoft rubber pads are durable, non-marking and non-slip.Sturdy supports provide stable work platform for waxing or edge sharpening.Extra-wide platforms support all ski and board width.Includes 2 C-clamps to secure the vise components to tabletops 42mm thick or less.
